alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 4:02PM EDT until July 16 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... Northeastern Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Grady County in southwestern Georgia... Thomas County in south central Georgia... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 402 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Cairo to near Tallahassee, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Monticello, Cairo, Thomasville, Boston, Pavo, Barwick, Alma, Dills, Thomasville Municipal A/P, Dillon, Everett, Rocky Hill, Miccosukee, Merrillville, Drifton, Killearn Estates, Casa Blanco, Princes Still and Pisgah Church. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
